title: Product Marketing Manager [12 Month contract]
content:
Thinkific is a software platform that gives anyone the ability to easily create and sell online courses, build vibrant communities, and monetize memberships. We believe in impactful and innovative work: our team of 250+ Thinkers is building and expanding an incredible product that empowers Creator Educators and businesses around the globe while working collaboratively to learn, grow, and succeed together. Join us to see how we’re building one of the best workplaces in Canadian tech!
We believe every candidate should have a fair, inclusive, and overall great experience when exploring a new role with Thinkific. That starts with outlining our hiring process so you know what to expect every step of the way—click here to learn more: https://thnk.cc/whattoexpectAre you a strong storyteller with a passion for product marketing? We’re looking for a Product Marketing Manager (12 month contract) to join us at Thinkific. 
As a Product Marketing Manager at Thinkific, you’ll quickly become an expert in our platform and the features and benefits we offer to various customer segments. Reporting to the Team Lead, Product Marketing, and focused on our Scale and Plus customers and features, you’ll work across teams to help us shine the spotlight on existing and upcoming feature launches. You are passionate about online education, understand platform technologies, and have extensive experience building content and driving sales readiness. 
Your goal will be to conduct competitive analysis, understand market trends, and collaborate with Product to strategize on upcoming development work. Here’s how you’ll accomplish this: 

Establish a clear definition of our target customer segments, how they buy, their buying criteria, and how they differ and overlap 
Build up a detailed understanding of our competitors and their offerings, and how to surpass them
Craft the messaging and positioning for Thinkific Scale and Plus customers
Partner closely with the Creative team in creating an engaging web presence, driving visitors and conversions
Influence product development and launch strategy, based on customer insight, market research, customer adoption, and market awareness
Communicate the value proposition of product features to the Marketing and Sales teams and help to develop sales and marketing collateral 
Manage and execute the launches of new product features through cross-functional teams
Create content (e.g. sales documentation, product videos, website copy, blog posts, webinars) and campaigns to articulate the benefits of our products to the world

The person we have in mind likely:

Has 7+ years’ experience in product marketing (or similar role) for a SaaS company for mid-market or enterprise audience
Is comfortable using tools like Hubspot, Salesforce, Slack, Unbounce, WordPress, and Freshdesk
Can demonstrate excellent project management skills and can ensure a project stays on track
Is a natural communicator who can build consensus and ensure that all stakeholders are on the same page
Loves data and believes strongly in data-driven decision making
Loves to learn and grow. They’ve found (and keep looking for) ways to level up their skills in this field, whether that’s through formal education, gaining professional experience, or maybe even building their own business 

These things would also be nice, but we think you could learn them on the job: 

The ability to constantly think outside the box, coming up with creative ways to position new and existing features
Feels comfortable conducting customer interviews
Knows how to build personas & use cases

The recruitment compensation range for this position is $102,000 - 127,000 CAD
Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging & Accessibility
This is just our initial idea of who we’re looking for! At Thinkific, we know that people have unique career journeys. If your experience is close to what we’ve described but you feel that you might be missing a few of the requirements, please still apply! We believe in equal opportunity and are committed to diversity, equity, inclusion, and belonging across every facet of our business.
We’re also committed to providing a comfortable and accessible interview experience for every candidate. If there are any accommodations our team can make throughout our hiring process (big or small), please let us know.      
What you can expect if you join Thinkific:

An amazing team of talented, passionate, and kind Thinkers. Together, we’ve built an amazing culture—we’re one of Canada's Top Small & Medium Employers!
The chance to build, improve, and innovate on a platform that’s driving positive impact—we already support 50,000+ active creators in over 165 countries.
A competitive compensation package. This includes your base salary, equity, and an Employee Share Purchase Plan, on top of some great perks. 
Comprehensive benefits starting on Day 1. We have health, vision, and dental coverage for you and your family, plus $3000 for mental health care and a health or personal spending account.
A flexible work environment—choose to work from home, at our Vancouver HQ, a co-working space, or anywhere there’s wifi for a change of scenery. 
An open vacation policy and flexible work environment. Our team takes a minimum of 4 weeks vacation each year and makes work fit into their lives (not the other way around).
Career growth. We put an emphasis on your development with our annual $1500 USD Learn and Grow fund, training, mentorship, coaching, and internal promotion opportunities.
A home office setup. You’ll be ready to succeed with a company-owned Macbook Pro and a budget to get a desk, chair, or any accessories to help you work comfortably and productively. 
Generous parental leave top-ups for up to 32 weeks, as well as fertility coverage through our group benefits plan.
A place where you can bring your whole self to work. We know that different perspectives lead to amazing ideas, more innovation, and, ultimately, our success as a company. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, identities, and statuses. Whoever you are—we can't wait to meet you!

We continuously seek out and attract a wealth of experiences and perspectives, and we invite you to complete this optional survey to help us understand and evaluate our efforts. 

All information will be kept confidential, will only be used for the sole purpose of evaluating our diversity and inclusion hiring practices, and will be kept separate from your name and application. Thank you for your participation!
